name: Cold Rush (Canceled)
blurb: Cold Rush - An action, adventure, free roaming computer based RPG/FPS which takes you to the Moon in a race for alien technology.

rewards.reward: Thank you so much for you pledge! Everything counts and you count to us. Every backer at this level will receive a Cold Rush forum membership. We invite you to members to interact with our team; encourage, add suggestions or comments, experience the creative process and be a part of our community. Also you receive access to download digital wallpapers and high resolution artist images for your PC.
All backers at this level with receive the previous level offering plus a digital download of the finished Cold Rush game. The FUN STARTS HERE!
For this level, you will receive the previous reward tier plus a digital download of the Cold Rush sound track and access to a streaming documentary \u201cCreating the Cold Rush\u201d.
For this backing level you will receive the previous offering tier plus high resolution digital downloads of; Wall papers for your pc, Game Concept art and Game Maps.

And there\u2019s MORE! You receive the previous offering tier plus a limited edition Cold Rush-KickStarter T-Shirt, digital Game Players Guide, a 3D viewer to view game artifacts and a signed thank you Card. Oh, also a MOON ROCK with your name or short inscription on it placed somewhere in the game.
For this Offering level, you\u2019ll receive the previous offering tier. Added to this, special thanks in the games credits, VIP forum membership, Game Poster and team cloth patch.

Previous offering tier, plus Boxed version of the game with DVD and printed manual and materials, printed book of our game art, mouse pad and DVD copy of \u201cThe making of a Cold Rush\u201d documentary.
Back this level and you'll not only receive the previous offering tier, BUT you'll be able to customize your active game character with your own voice over. Now we're having FUN.

Even more FUN. Back this offering, you'll get the previous offering, team hat with patch, and you'll be able to customize your active game character with not only your voice but your face as well. Now we're talking!

Now your face on your active character is COOL, but back this offering and you\u2019ll be able to have your face installed on a permanent game character, your name immortalized on a mountain or crater and a trading card with the character with your likeness. Back this offer, you\u2019ll of course get the previous tier offering, in addition, you\u2019ll receive an autographed game poster with your character with your likeness, an autographed art print and 5 extra game licenses to give to your friends or family.

Help us design the GAME. With this offering tier, exclusive access to game development materials, be able to chat with team members, submit your thoughts and ideas, Special Golden Thank You in game credits,  an exceptional wood plague thanking you and everything included in the 9th level offering tier.

Be immortalized with a moon base, space station or space ship with your NAME on it. Back this offer and we'll let you name one of the above mentioned, a full size space helmet replica with your name, a portrait with your likeness in the games hall of warriors as well as everything included in the tier 8 offering.

This is our ULIMATE pledge pack. With this offering you\u2019ll be invited to our Cold Rush Release party. Spend a day behind the scenes, meet the team, challenge us in the Cold Rush world, be our guest of honor at our release dinner. You will also receive everything in the tier 12 offer. You will have to pay for travel and accommodations to our office in Lynnwood, Washington for the party and game day. We very much thank everyone for their generous support.
